Pages.Text: Yesterday an adventurer brought me a tale of a strange grotto in the Faranar Hills, about halfway between Uziz and poor Leikotha's terrible tomb. In this grotto reside several of the elusive Fire Elementals, said to be star-spawned creatures which retreated underground after a great cataclysm. They now seem to guard a strange red stone. None know what this stone may be, as all who have attempted to retrieve have been blistered by the fireballs of the Elementals.
